Package com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.simulator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CitizenProxyFactory
    Only class to create CitizenProxy objects.
    Driver  
    Launcher
    Interface for a simulation launcher that is to be registered as a startup hook of the runtime configuration.
    RegionListener
    A RegionListner object is called when state of a region is changed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CitizenProxy
    Part of Citizen agent.
    Controller  
    LauncherProxy
    Proxy between XASDI(X10) and xasdi_bridge(Java).
    Place
    Resource used by some Citizen agents.
    Region
    Simulation object manages agents(Citizen, Driver), factories of Citizen agents,
    World
    Manages simulation state and logs.
